title: Omnipotent Overlord - Novel Updates
tags: Age Progression   Artifacts   Beast Companions   Cultivation   Death of Loved Ones   Game Elements   Gate to Another World   Interdimensional Travel   Male Protagonist   Modern Day   Multiple Realms   Returning from Another World   Second Chance   Time Travel   Weak to Strong
author: Lord Dragon   龙大人
description:
Somewhere in the universe,  there was an altar. On it, lay a bloody eye as big as the sun itself. It burst with light and bathed the entire galaxy in red.

“The aura of an ancestral artifact!” Someone’s voice rose in surprise.

“Where?”

“Earth!”

The Great Galactic Era had begun.>
